messages.title: It's Time Thurrock Had A New MP
messages.content: This election is our chance to get a new MP. I'll fight for you just as I have done as a Councillor and MEP. The alternative is five more years of an MP only interested in her Westminster career. Thurrock residents cannot forget how she has treated us over the last seven years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Thurrock Council figures show I have put in more casework and helped more people in Thurrock than both Tory MPs combined.
No more Crossings in Thurrock. Put it elsewhere, Thurrock has had enough. It will bring more traffic and more pollution.
Thurrock residents should be put first in the housing queue. We need to reduce migration to ease pressure on the housing stock.
On 5th April, only UKIP MEPs voted to stop unlimited migration after Brexit. The Tories and Labour want to continue free movement.
72% of people in Thurrock voted to leave the EU. The Tory MP voted to Remain in the EU. Please support me to get a Brexit MP.
I will fight the Tory cuts to our NHS including the proposed ending of services at Orsett Hospital. Thurrock needs a new hospital.
